String.Source: I don't see how blood has anything to do with it.
String.Dest: 我没看出鲜血在这里有什么用。

String.Source: It has everything to do with it! Gartheim wasn't raised to use lowborn tactics.
String.Dest: 所有东西都要通过它来起效的啊！只用下等人的血是召唤不了戈塞姆的。

String.Source: I don't see how blood has anything to do with it.
String.Dest: 我没看出鲜血在这里有什么用。

String.Source: He met Kroth in the cave man to beast. The old bear respected that. No, respect is the wrong word. He feared him.
String.Dest: He met Kroth in the cave man to beast. The old bear respected that. No, respect is the wrong word. He feared him.

String.Source: Actually, I met with the High Queen. We spoke at length.
String.Dest: 其实，我会见了至高的皇后。我们还谈了很长时间。

String.Source: It does give me some solace that the Queen does still have time to speak with those of high birth.
String.Dest: 女王仍有些时间跟那些出身高贵的人交谈这件事给了我些许安慰。

String.Source: Actually, I met with the High Queen. We spoke at length.
String.Dest: 其实，我会见了至高的皇后。我们还谈了很长时间。

String.Source: Unfortunately, it seems you may have better luck dressed as a skeever when seeking an audience with this particular Jarl.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，想让这位领主听你进言，那你打扮成一只雪鼠的可能性还高一点。

String.Source: Actually, I met with the High Queen. We spoke at length.
String.Dest: 其实，我会见了至高的皇后。我们还谈了很长时间。

String.Source: How far the noble have fallen! I think it's high time I found a Jarl who recognizes the value of etiquette.
String.Dest: 看看贵族们都堕落成什么样了！我想这正是该去寻找一个能意识到礼仪真正价值的领主的时候了。

String.Source: Actually, I met with the High Queen. We spoke at length.
String.Dest: 其实，我会见了至高的皇后。我们还谈了很长时间。

String.Source: I hope not dressed in that garb! I've met goblins with better taste in attire. Can you even tell the difference between sheepskin and goat hides?
String.Dest: 我希望不是要穿那身！我见过的地精都比那家伙的品味强。我问你能分清绵羊皮和山羊皮有什么区别吗？

String.Source: Actually, I met with the High Queen. We spoke at length.
String.Dest: 其实，我会见了至高的皇后。我们还谈了很长时间。

String.Source: No doubt you wish to claim an audience with the Jarl of Windhelm doing the same! Perhaps the rumors about him being a brute were right after all.
String.Dest: No doubt you wish to claim an audience with the Jarl of Windhelm doing the same! Perhaps the rumors about him being a brute were right after all.

String.Source: Actually, I met with the High Queen. We spoke at length.
String.Dest: 其实，我会见了至高的皇后。我们还谈了很长时间。

String.Source: How far the noble have fallen! I think it's high time I found a Jarl who recognizes the value of etiquette.
String.Dest: 看看贵族们都堕落成什么样了！我想这正是该去寻找一个能意识到礼仪真正价值的领主的时候了。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: No, I should be the one apologizing. It's not a noble like yourself who is causing this extensive delay.
String.Dest: 不不不，该道歉的人是我。这种夸张的迟到不能怪罪到您这样的大人物头上。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: It's commoners that have no business in a place like the Blue Palace. Low class citizens treating the walls like their personal latrine.
String.Dest: 这就是个在蓝宫之类的地方没有往来关系的下等人。那些下等公民把墙看得像他们的私人厕所一样。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: It's no wonder I can't get an audience with the High Queen, with the commoners hoarding her time. Of course, it's her fault for letting them in.
String.Dest: 难怪我没有机会觐见至高女王，跟平民交涉就够她忙的了。当然，放他们进蓝宫是她自找的。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: In fact, maybe I ought to pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually has standards.
String.Dest: 说实话，也许我应该去拜访一下风舵城的领主。我听说他确实挺有本事。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: That's the problem with you beggars and rubes. You don't know how to behave. You lack the stock.
String.Dest: 你的问题是，你就像个乞丐和乡巴佬一样，一点儿礼貌都没有。你缺乏高贵的血统。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: That's why you have no business in a place like the Blue Palace.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么你跟像蓝宫这样的地方没有业务往来。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: It's no wonder I can't get an audience with the High Queen, with all you commoners hoarding her time. Of course, it's her fault for letting you in.
String.Dest: 难怪我没有机会觐见至高女王，跟你们这群下等人交涉就够她忙的了。当然，放你们进蓝宫是她自找的。

String.Source: My apologies, my lord. I didn't mean to offend.
String.Dest: 我道歉，我的大人。我无意冒犯。

String.Source: In fact, maybe I ought to pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually has standards.
String.Dest: 说实话，也许我应该去拜访一下风舵城的领主。我听说他确实挺有本事。

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: Peasants may be able to replace their tunic at the local haberdash, but I am an Oak-Heart of Haafingar!
String.Dest: 像你这样的土包子才会用当地服装代替自己的装束。但我是个哈尔芬加的橡木心啊！

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! A noble like yourself would understand.
String.Dest: 这个披风在我的家族传承了七代，七代！像你这样的上等人应该明白这意味着什么。

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: It is irreplaceable!
String.Dest: 它是无可取代的！

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: A peasant like yourself may be able to replace their tunic at the local haberdash, but I am a Oak-Heart of Haafingar!
String.Dest: 像你这样的土包子才会用当地服装代替自己的装束。但我是个哈尔芬加的橡木心啊！

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! Can you count to seven, peasant? I'd venture not, but it's a long time.
String.Dest: 这件斗篷在我家族里传了七代！七代！能数到七么，你这乡巴佬？我打赌你不行，但七代真的是很长的一段时间。

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: You could stop by Radiant Raiment and get a new one.
String.Dest: 你应该到锦衣买件新的。

String.Source: It is irreplaceable!
String.Dest: 它是无可取代的！

String.Source: What exactly can the High Queen do for you then?
String.Dest: 至高皇后究竟能为你做点儿什么呢？

String.Source: Well, she can start by hiring a real executioner and having him take Ahtar's head.
String.Dest: 嗯，她可以雇佣一个真正的刽子手，然后让他砍下阿塔的脑袋并以此作为开始。

String.Source: What exactly can the High Queen do for you then?
String.Dest: 至高皇后究竟能为你做点儿什么呢？

String.Source: Some land would be nice, like say, Katla's Farm or Dragon Bridge. It will likely take both to compensate me for my loss.
String.Dest: 有些地方非常棒，比如说，凯特拉的农场以及龙桥。它们恰如其分地补偿了我所失去的东西。

String.Source: What exactly can the High Queen do for you then?
String.Dest: 至高皇后究竟能为你做点儿什么呢？

String.Source: And if it's true what the guards say, and the High Queen has no intention of seeing me, then perhaps I'll go talk to someone who will.
String.Dest: 如果守卫说的都是真的，而且至高女王又无意见我，那我就去说给愿意见我的人听。

String.Source: What exactly can the High Queen do for you then?
String.Dest: 至高皇后究竟能为你做点儿什么呢？

String.Source: In fact, I think I'll pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually values Nord heritage.
String.Dest: 事实上，我想我会去拜访风舵城的领主，我听说他是一个传统的诺德人。

String.Source: What exactly can Elisif do for you then?
String.Dest: 究竟艾利西弗能为你做什么呢？

String.Source: First of all, you will address the lady as the High Queen Elisif, peasant, and myself as your Lord.
String.Dest: 首先，你得称呼这位女士为至高皇后艾利西弗，乡巴佬，并且称呼我为领主大人。

String.Source: What exactly can Elisif do for you then?
String.Dest: 究竟艾利西弗能为你做什么呢？

String.Source: As for what the High Queen can do for me, she can start by hiring a real executioner and having him take Ahtar's head.
String.Dest: 至于至高女王能为我做什么，我觉得她可以从雇佣一个真正的刽子手，然后让他砍掉阿塔的脑袋作为开始。

String.Source: What exactly can Elisif do for you then?
String.Dest: 究竟艾利西弗能为你做什么呢？

String.Source: Some land would be nice, like say, Katla's Farm or Dragon Bridge. It will likely take both to compensate me for my loss.
String.Dest: 有些地方非常棒，比如说，凯特拉的农场以及龙桥。它们恰如其分地补偿了我所失去的东西。

String.Source: What exactly can Elisif do for you then?
String.Dest: 究竟艾利西弗能为你做什么呢？

String.Source: And if it's true what the guards say, and the High Queen has no intention of seeing me, then perhaps I'll go talk to someone who will.
String.Dest: 如果守卫说的都是真的，而且至高女王又无意见我，那我就去说给愿意见我的人听。

String.Source: What exactly can Elisif do for you then?
String.Dest: 究竟艾利西弗能为你做什么呢？

String.Source: In fact, I think I'll pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually values Nord heritage.
String.Dest: 事实上，我想我会去拜访风舵城的领主，我听说他是一个传统的诺德人。

String.Source: I could relay your message to the Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以向领主转达你的信息。

String.Source: No, this is a matter of personal honor, fellow noble, and the Jarl must hear it from the source.
String.Dest: 不，这事关个人的荣誉与高尚，领主必须亲耳听到才行。

String.Source: I could relay your message to the Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以向领主转达你的信息。

String.Source: But perhaps I have come to the wrong Jarl. It doesn't seem like this one has taught his guards the importance of Nord pride.
String.Dest: 但也可能是我找错领主了。这个领主似乎没告诉他的守卫，诺德人有多看重尊严。

String.Source: I could relay your message to the Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以向领主转达你的信息。

String.Source: In that case, I will find one who does.
String.Dest: 既然如此，我会找出做了这件事的人。

String.Source: I could relay your message to the Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以向领主转达你的信息。

String.Source: Outlandish! I won't have the honor of the Oak-Heart family dependent on the ramblings of a commoner! A true Jarl would not brook such an insult!
String.Dest: Outlandish! I won't have the honor of the Oak-Heart family dependent on the ramblings of a commoner! A true Jarl would not brook such an insult!

String.Source: I could relay your message to the Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以向领主转达你的信息。

String.Source: But perhaps I have come to the wrong Jarl. It doesn't seem like this one has taught his guards the importance of Nord pride.
String.Dest: 但也可能是我找错领主了。这个领主似乎没告诉他的守卫，诺德人有多看重尊严。

String.Source: I could relay your message to the Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以向领主转达你的信息。

String.Source: In that case, I will find one who does.
String.Dest: 既然如此，我会找出做了这件事的人。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: So you're an alchemist, huh? Sounds like something you learn when you can't afford to replace things with gold.
String.Dest: 那么说你是个炼金术师喽？听起来就像是当你接受不了点石成金时就玩命学习什么的。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: In this case, though, such skills might prove useful. That is, if I was willing to entrust the Cloak of Oak-heart to some plant-coddling rube!
String.Dest: 虽然在这种情况下，这种技巧可能有点用。 换句话说，假如我愿意把橡心斗篷交付给一些种植狂乡巴佬的话！

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! A noble like yourself would understand.
String.Dest: 这个披风在我的家族传承了七代，七代！像你这样的上等人应该明白这意味着什么。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: So you're an alchemist, huh? Sounds like something you learn when you can't afford to replace things with gold.
String.Dest: 那么说你是个炼金术师喽？听起来就像是当你接受不了点石成金时就玩命学习什么的。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: In this case, though, such skills might prove useful. That is, if I was willing to entrust the Cloak of Oak-heart to some plant-coddling rube!
String.Dest: 虽然在这种情况下，这种技巧可能有点用。 换句话说，假如我愿意把橡心斗篷交付给一些种植狂乡巴佬的话！

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! Can you count to seven, peasant? I'd venture not, but it's a long time.
String.Dest: 这件斗篷在我家族里传了七代！七代！能数到七么，你这乡巴佬？我打赌你不行，但七代真的是很长的一段时间。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Animal fats, plant oils, and void salts can remove blood stains.
String.Dest: （炼金术）动物脂肪，植物油，加上虚无盐就能洗掉血渍。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Try rubbing some some nirnroot oil and fire salts on it.
String.Dest: (炼金) 试着涂一些奈恩根油和火盐上去。

String.Source: Nirnroot oil? Fire salts? Are you trying to wash my cloak or light it on fire? This is why I will not trust its fate to some berry picker!
String.Dest: 奈恩根油？火盐？你想用火洗我的斗篷还是烧我的斗篷啊？这就是我这辈子永远不会把它的命运交给泥腿子的原因！

String.Source: (Alchemy) Try rubbing some some nirnroot oil and fire salts on it.
String.Dest: (炼金) 试着涂一些奈恩根油和火盐上去。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! A noble like yourself would understand.
String.Dest: 这个披风在我的家族传承了七代，七代！像你这样的上等人应该明白这意味着什么。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Try rubbing some some nirnroot oil and fire salts on it.
String.Dest: (炼金) 试着涂一些奈恩根油和火盐上去。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Try rubbing some some nirnroot oil and fire salts on it.
String.Dest: (炼金) 试着涂一些奈恩根油和火盐上去。

String.Source: Nirnroot oil? Fire salts? Are you trying to wash my cloak or light it on fire? This is why I will not trust its fate to some berry picker!
String.Dest: 奈恩根油？火盐？你想用火洗我的斗篷还是烧我的斗篷啊？这就是我这辈子永远不会把它的命运交给泥腿子的原因！

String.Source: (Alchemy) Try rubbing some some nirnroot oil and fire salts on it.
String.Dest: (炼金) 试着涂一些奈恩根油和火盐上去。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! Can you count to seven, peasant? I'd venture not, but it's a long time.
String.Dest: 这件斗篷在我家族里传了七代！七代！能数到七么，你这乡巴佬？我打赌你不行，但七代真的是很长的一段时间。

String.Source: (Alchemy) Try rubbing some some nirnroot oil and fire salts on it.
String.Dest: (炼金) 试着涂一些奈恩根油和火盐上去。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: What happened after that?
String.Dest: 然后怎么样了？

String.Source: When Gartheim didn't budge, Kroth was startled, but not stilled. He charged at my ancestor, aiming his fangs for his throat.
String.Dest: 当加特海姆不再让步的时候，克罗特受到了惊吓，但这并没有持续多长时间。他猛冲向我的祖先，阴森森的利齿正对着他的喉咙。

String.Source: What happened after that?
String.Dest: 然后怎么样了？

String.Source: That's when Gartheim let out a Battlecry, and met him at the center of the cavern, wrestling the mighty bear to the ground.
String.Dest: 就在这时加特海姆放声怒吼，到洞窟中央与他交手，他把那头巨熊摔到了地上。

String.Source: What happened after that?
String.Dest: 然后怎么样了？

String.Source: As they fell to the ground, Gartheim had one arm around Kroth's throat. Kroth had the other one in his mouth.
String.Dest: 当他们摔到地上的时候，加特海姆用一条胳膊紧扣住克罗特的咽喉。而克罗特则死死咬住加特海姆的另一条胳膊。

String.Source: What happened after that?
String.Dest: 然后怎么样了？

String.Source: It was a race. Gartheim was bleeding to death. Kroth was choking. In the end, only my ancestor was left standing. He let Kroth keep the arm.
String.Dest: 这是一个死亡竞赛。加特海姆失血过多就快死亡，克罗特被勒住脖子就快断气。最后，只剩下我的祖先还站着。他让克罗特保住了他的手臂。

String.Source: Of course they were.
String.Dest: 他们当然是。

String.Source: When Gartheim didn't budge, Kroth was startled, but not stilled. He charged at my ancestor, aiming his fangs for his throat.
String.Dest: 当加特海姆不再让步的时候，克罗特受到了惊吓，但这并没有持续多长时间。他猛冲向我的祖先，阴森森的利齿正对着他的喉咙。

String.Source: Of course they were.
String.Dest: 他们当然是。

String.Source: That's when Gartheim let out a Battlecry, and met him at the center of the cavern, wrestling the mighty bear to the ground.
String.Dest: 就在这时加特海姆放声怒吼，到洞窟中央与他交手，他把那头巨熊摔到了地上。

String.Source: Of course they were.
String.Dest: 他们当然是。

String.Source: As they fell to the ground, Gartheim had one arm around Kroth's throat. Kroth had the other one in his mouth.
String.Dest: 当他们摔到地上的时候，加特海姆用一条胳膊紧扣住克罗特的咽喉。而克罗特则死死咬住加特海姆的另一条胳膊。

String.Source: Of course they were.
String.Dest: 他们当然是。

String.Source: It was a race. Gartheim was bleeding to death. Kroth was choking. In the end, only my ancestor was left standing. He let Kroth keep the arm.
String.Dest: It was a race. Gartheim was bleeding to death. Kroth was choking. In the end, only my ancestor was left standing. He let Kroth keep the arm.

String.Source: (Let him continue).
String.Dest: （让他继续）。

String.Source: They say when Gartheim entered that cave, all of Sovngarde stopped to watch. Even Olaf One-Eye put down his flagon to take a gander.
String.Dest: They say when Gartheim entered that cave, all of Sovngarde stopped to watch. Even Olaf One-Eye put down his flagon to take a gander.

String.Source: (Let him continue).
String.Dest: （让他继续）。

String.Source: Kroth stood on his hind legs, and let out a roar that shook High Hrothgar. Might have caused an avalanche. That's how loud it was.
String.Dest: Kroth stood on his hind legs, and let out a roar that shook High Hrothgar. Might have caused an avalanche. That's how loud it was.

String.Source: (Let him continue).
String.Dest: （让他继续）。

String.Source: Anyways, where was I? Oh right, my ancestor Gartheim, true to his name, withstood the mighty beast's roar. His heart was oak, as was his britches.
String.Dest: Anyways, where was I? Oh right, my ancestor Gartheim, true to his name, withstood the mighty beast's roar. His heart was oak, as was his britches.

String.Source: I wouldn't worry about it. It's barely noticeable.
String.Dest: 我才不是担心，只是略微留意罢了。

String.Source: That's not the point, my fellow noble. You of all people should be aware of the concept of family heirlooms. This cloak is one such piece.
String.Dest: That's not the point, my fellow noble. You of all people should be aware of the concept of family heirlooms. This cloak is one such piece.

String.Source: I wouldn't worry about it. It's barely noticeable.
String.Dest: 我才不是担心，只是略微留意罢了。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven!
String.Dest: 这件斗篷在我的家族里传了七代！七代！

String.Source: I wouldn't worry about it. It's barely noticeable.
String.Dest: 我才不是担心，只是略微留意罢了。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: I wouldn't worry about it. It's barely noticeable.
String.Dest: 我才不是担心，只是略微留意罢了。

String.Source: Of course I wouldn't expect a commoner like you to tell the difference between a fine robe and a family heirloom.
String.Dest: 我当然不会指望像你一样的平民能知道一件精致的长袍和一个传家宝之间的区别。

String.Source: I wouldn't worry about it. It's barely noticeable.
String.Dest: 我才不是担心，只是略微留意罢了。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! Can you count to seven, peasant? I'd venture not, but it's a long time.
String.Dest: 这件斗篷在我家族里传了七代！七代！能数到七么，你这乡巴佬？我打赌你不行，但七代真的是很长的一段时间。

String.Source: I wouldn't worry about it. It's barely noticeable.
String.Dest: 我才不是担心，只是略微留意罢了。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: You mean...walk in the footsteps of my great ancestors? Why...that's a splendid idea!
String.Dest: 你的意思是...循着我伟大祖先们的足迹走？为什么...等等，这是个好主意！

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: It's true what they say. Intelligent ideas are privy to those of high birth. That's why commoners are always trying to steal them.
String.Dest: 他们说的是真的。高贵的出身总会伴随着聪明的头脑。这就是为什么平民总想着为自己伪造一个身份。

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: In any case, I thank you. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a bear to slay.
String.Dest: 不管怎样, 谢谢你。那么，要是没什么事儿我就先走了，我还有头熊要去屠呢。

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: You mean...walk in the footsteps of my great ancestors? Why...that's a splendid idea!
String.Dest: 你的意思是...循着我伟大祖先们的足迹走？为什么...等等，这是个好主意！

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: Which is surprising coming from a commoner such as yourself. But I suppose every mortal is destined to have at least one great idea.
String.Dest: 你这么个下等人给了我一个惊喜。愚者千虑，终有一得。

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: I reckon that was yours. Enjoy the rest of your existence being wrong about everything.
String.Dest: 我猜那是你。用你的余生为你做下的每一件事忏悔吧。

String.Source: Why don't you vanquish a bear yourself and start a new tradition?
String.Dest: 你为啥不自己搞定一头熊，开个新惯例呢？

String.Source: Now if you'll excuse me, I have a bear to slay.
String.Dest: 要是没什么事儿我就先走了，我还有头熊要去屠呢。

String.Source: Ahtar does good work. I've seen it first hand.
String.Dest: 阿塔做的很好。我第一个看见的。

String.Source: Is that so? Well, maybe the sand-walker was finally sober, because the execution I witnessed was a tribute to incompetence.
String.Dest: 是这样吗？嗯，也许那个红卫人最后还是冷静下来了，我看到的时候他还一脸无能的样子呢。

String.Source: Ahtar does good work. I've seen it first hand.
String.Dest: 阿塔做的很好。我第一个看见的。

String.Source: It took two cuts to slice off the head, the first cut being so poor it squirted blood all over a couple of Elven dignitaries standing up front.
String.Dest: 用了两下才砍掉那颗脑袋，第一下砍得很笨，把血溅了对面的二位精灵高官满身。

String.Source: Ahtar does good work. I've seen it first hand.
String.Dest: 阿塔做的很好。我第一个看见的。

String.Source: I offered my handkerchief to the lady, as is custom, but instead she reached for my cloak, and wiped the blood all over the fur.
String.Dest: 我礼节性地把手帕交给女士，但她却用它把我斗篷上的血迹都擦干净了。

String.Source: If Jarls won't see you, you can try appealing to a higher authority.
String.Dest: 如果领主们不愿接见，你可以试着去接触更高层的人物。

String.Source: What higher authority? You mean like the Gods? Or perhaps the Greybeards? Why, that's a capital idea!
String.Dest: 什么更高的权威？你的意思是说比如神那样的？或者也许是灰胡子？为什么，这个想法真可怕！

String.Source: If Jarls won't see you, you can try appealing to a higher authority.
String.Dest: 如果领主们不愿接见，你可以试着去接触更高层的人物。

String.Source: It's true what they say. Intelligent ideas are privy to those of high birth. That's why commoners are always trying to steal them.
String.Dest: 他们说的是真的。高贵的出身总会伴随着聪明的头脑。这就是为什么平民总想着为自己伪造一个身份。

String.Source: If Jarls won't see you, you can try appealing to a higher authority.
String.Dest: 如果领主们不愿接见，你可以试着去接触更高层的人物。

String.Source: In any case, I thank you. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a mountain to climb.
String.Dest: 无论如何，谢谢你。现在，如果你不介意的话，我还有一座山要爬。

String.Source: If Jarls won't see you, you can try appealing to a higher authority.
String.Dest: 如果领主们不愿接见，你可以试着去接触更高层的人物。

String.Source: What higher authority? You mean like the Gods? Or perhaps the Greybeards? Why, that's a capital idea!
String.Dest: 什么更高的权威？你的意思是说比如神那样的？或者也许是灰胡子？为什么，这个想法真可怕！

String.Source: If Jarls won't see you, you can try appealing to a higher authority.
String.Dest: 如果领主们不愿接见，你可以试着去接触更高层的人物。

String.Source: Which is surprising coming from a commoner such as yourself. But I suppose every mortal is destined to have at least one great idea.
String.Dest: 你这么个下等人给了我一个惊喜。愚者千虑，终有一得。

String.Source: If Jarls won't see you, you can try appealing to a higher authority.
String.Dest: 如果领主们不愿接见，你可以试着去接触更高层的人物。

String.Source: I reckon that was yours. Enjoy the rest of your existence being wrong about everything. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a mountain to climb.
String.Dest: 我认为那是你的。享受你那剩余的不断犯错的生活吧。要是你没什么事了，我还要去爬山。

String.Source: Why don't you just walk in? It always works for me.
String.Dest: 为什么不直接进去？ 它一直为我所用。

String.Source: Fine nobility like yourself should realize that there is an etiquette when it comes to court. You don't simply waltz in and interrupt a session.
String.Dest: 像你这样高贵的人应该意识到进入法庭需要礼节。你不能简单的翩跹进入并打断开庭。

String.Source: Why don't you just walk in? It always works for me.
String.Dest: 为什么不直接进去？ 它一直为我所用。

String.Source: But perhaps the rumors are true, and the Jarl of Windhelm is a brute who does not understand nobility. In that case, I will find one who does.
String.Dest: 或许传言是真的，风舵城的领主是个不知高贵为何物的畜生。既然如此，我得去找个明事理的人。

String.Source: Why don't you just walk in? It always works for me.
String.Dest: 为什么不直接进去？ 它一直为我所用。

String.Source: And interrupt the court? You stupid peasant, they could be in session! You lowborn have no concept of proper etiquette!
String.Dest: 然后还要打扰宫廷？你这愚蠢的泥腿子，他们可能在开会呢！你这出身低贱的家伙完全没有得体的礼仪的概念！

String.Source: Why don't you just walk in? It always works for me.
String.Dest: 为什么不直接进去？ 它一直为我所用。

String.Source: But perhaps the rumors are true, and the Jarl of Windhelm is a brute who does not understand nobility. In that case, I will find one who does.
String.Dest: 或许传言是真的，风舵城的领主是个不知高贵为何物的畜生。既然如此，我得去找个明事理的人。

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: I thank you for your kind words my fellow noble. Although it's just a big a shame what's become of the Blue Palace.
String.Dest: I thank you for your kind words my fellow noble. Although it's just a big a shame what's become of the Blue Palace.

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: They'll let anyone into court these days. Farmers, beggars...even the drunks are treating the walls like their personal latrine.
String.Dest: 最近他们好像什么人都能给放进来。农夫，乞丐...还有把墙根当厕所的醉鬼。

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: Meanwhile, highborn Nords such as myself are left to sit here and wait for an audience. It goes against everything our ancestors stood for.
String.Dest: 然而，像我这样出身高贵的诺德人却被扔在一旁，等候着一位倾听者的出现。这简直是对老祖宗们的背叛。

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: Well, I'm done waiting. In fact, I think I'll pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually values Nord heritage.
String.Dest: 哦，我不想再等了。实际上，我觉着我应该去找风舵城领主。我听说他是个很传统的诺德人。

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: I am surprised a lowborn such of yourself is capable of recognizing its value. But I suppose its magnificence extends beyond one's caste.
String.Dest: 我很惊讶像这样一个出身卑贱的人竟然能认识到它的价值。但是我想它的宏伟程度已经超出了一个人的社会地位。

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: Perhaps that's why the High Queen lets people like yourself in the Blue Palace. But it takes more than speechcraft to be a true noble.
String.Dest: Perhaps that's why the High Queen lets people like yourself in the Blue Palace. But it takes more than speechcraft to be a true noble.

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: Meanwhile, highborn Nords such as myself are left to sit here and wait for an audience. It goes against everything our ancestors stood for.
String.Dest: 然而，像我这样出身高贵的诺德人却被扔在一旁，等候着一位倾听者的出现。这简直是对老祖宗们的背叛。

String.Source: It's a lovely cloak and a shame what happened to it.
String.Dest: 多漂亮的一件斗篷，可惜了。

String.Source: Well, I'm done waiting. In fact, I think I'll pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually values Nord heritage.
String.Dest: 哦，我不想再等了。实际上，我觉着我应该去找风舵城领主。我听说他是个很传统的诺德人。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: Are you suggesting that my manner of dress doesn't distinguish me from the rabble? I know the blood stain is in poor taste, but still.
String.Dest: 你是说我的穿着习惯与下层社会那些人没有区别？我知道有血迹会显得粗俗，但我仍然如此。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: You and the guards need to get your eyes examined, because even a moth priest can see I am a highborn lord.
String.Dest: 你和这些守卫眼睛瞎了吗！即使是个圣蛾祭司也能看出我是个出身高贵的领主啊。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: But that's the problem, isn't it? You can't see, and neither can the Jarl.
String.Dest: 但这就是问题所在，不是么？你看不见，领主也是。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: At the very least, it doesn't seem like this one has taught his guards the importance of respecting their betters.
String.Dest: 最起码，看来他是完全没教会他的守卫尊重长辈的重要性。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: It wouldn't surprise me, seeing as both you and the guards are lowborn trash.
String.Dest: 鉴于你和守卫都是出身低贱的垃圾，我一点儿也不感到奇怪。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: One word from me and the Jarl will have you in the dungeon faster than you can spell it.
String.Dest: 要从我这打探出一个字，你还来不及写下它，就会被领主打入大牢。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: But that's the problem, isn't it? You can't read, and neither can the Jarl.
String.Dest: 但这就是问题所在，不是么？你不识字，领主也不识字。

String.Source: Maybe they mistook you for a commoner. I certainly did.
String.Dest: 也许他们把你错认为是平民，我就是这样。

String.Source: At the very least, it doesn't seem like this one has taught his guards the importance of respecting their betters.
String.Dest: 最起码，看来他是完全没教会他的守卫尊重长辈的重要性。

String.Source: Have you come to visit the High Queen? Well, get in line. I've been waiting for weeks, on account of that clumsy oaf of an executioner.
String.Dest: 你是来见女王陛下的？那就排好队。我已经等了几个星期了，就为了给那个呆瓜脑袋找个行刑手。

String.Source: Can you believe these brutes? They refuse to let me into the Palace of the Kings! The nerve! The audacity!
String.Dest: 你能相信这些畜生？他们拒绝让我进入国王的宫殿！神经兮兮！厚颜无耻​​！

String.Source: Wait, don't I know you? Weren't you in Solitude to speak with the High Queen? I suppose you got tired of waiting as well.
String.Dest: 等等，你不认识我吗？你没在独孤城跟至高女王说过话？我猜你也厌倦等待了吧。

String.Source: The Jarl sent a bunch of men in after him. Soldiers, adventurers, Companions. But the lowborns died without much of a fuss.
String.Dest: The Jarl sent a bunch of men in after him. Soldiers, adventurers, Companions. But the lowborns died without much of a fuss.

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: That's when my great ancestor Gartheim Oak-Heart came along, on a pilgrimage to High Hrothgar.
String.Dest: 我伟大的祖先加特海姆一路走来，他登上霍斯加高峰去朝圣。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: When he heard about the bear trouble, he decided to help. Of course, the locals were skeptical.
String.Dest: 当他听到关于熊的麻烦时，他决定给以帮助。当然，当地人对此持怀疑态度。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Gartheim didn't carry any bear traps or poisons or even a weapon with him. All he had was the hands the Gods gave him, and his noble blood.
String.Dest: Gartheim didn't carry any bear traps or poisons or even a weapon with him. All he had was the hands the Gods gave him, and his noble blood.

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: You mean you haven't heard it already? Didn't your mother ever read you the story as a child? It's only the most famous Nord tale in all of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 你是说你还没有听说过？你小时候你妈没念给你听？这可是天际最着名的传奇故事！

String.Source: I'd like to hear the story of how your ancestor strangled a bear.
String.Dest: 我很想听听你的祖先勒死一头熊的故事。

String.Source: Let's see, it happened in a cave somewhere in Ivarstead I believe. It was winter I think...what am I saying, of course it was winter.
String.Dest: 让我想想，我相信这发生在紫杉镇那边的一个洞穴中。我想那是一个冬天...我在说什么，那当然是一个冬天。

String.Source: I'd like to hear the story of how your ancestor strangled a bear.
String.Dest: 我很想听听你的祖先勒死一头熊的故事。

String.Source: Every good Nord story happens in winter. Now where was I...oh right. There was once this bear who lived in old Pinepeak Cavern named Kroth.
String.Dest: 每一个传奇的诺德故事都发生在冬天。唉我说到哪儿了...哦对了。从前，有只叫克罗特的熊，居住在古老的松木峰洞穴里。

String.Source: I'd like to hear the story of how your ancestor strangled a bear.
String.Dest: 我很想听听你的祖先勒死一头熊的故事。

String.Source: Not just any bear, mind you. He was as tall as a giant, with paws the size of a wagon. And he was surly.
String.Dest: Not just any bear, mind you. He was as tall as a giant, with paws the size of a wagon. And he was surly.

String.Source: I'd like to hear the story of how your ancestor strangled a bear.
String.Dest: 我很想听听你的祖先勒死一头熊的故事。

String.Source: So you've seen it too. Although judging by the state of your clothing, you were lucky.
String.Dest: 这么说你也见过它。不过从你的衣着看来，你很幸运啊。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: The execution I witnessed was nothing short of an ode to incompetence.
String.Dest: 我见证的处决无疑是对无能的歌颂。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: It took two cuts to slice off the head, the first cut being so poor it squirted blood all over a couple of Elven dignitaries standing up front.
String.Dest: 用了两下才砍掉那颗脑袋，第一下砍得很笨，把血溅了对面的二位精灵高官满身。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: I offered my handkerchief to the lady, as is custom, but instead she reached for my cloak, and wiped the blood all over the fur.
String.Dest: 我礼节性地把手帕交给女士，但她却用它把我斗篷上的血迹都擦干净了。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: So you've seen it too. You were lucky then. Not that it would have mattered much, with that brutish outfit you're wearing.
String.Dest: 这样说来你也见过了。真是好运气啊你。不过从你的穿着来看，好像也没什么大不了。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: The execution I witnessed was nothing short of an ode to incompetence.
String.Dest: 我见证的处决无疑是对无能的歌颂。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: It took two cuts to slice off the head, the first cut being so poor it squirted blood all over a couple of Elven dignitaries standing up front.
String.Dest: 用了两下才砍掉那颗脑袋，第一下砍得很笨，把血溅了对面的二位精灵高官满身。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: I offered my handkerchief to the lady, as is custom, but instead she reached for my cloak, and wiped the blood all over the fur.
String.Dest: 我礼节性地把手帕交给女士，但她却用它把我斗篷上的血迹都擦干净了。

String.Source: You're right to be angry. The executioner here couldn't dice a carrot.
String.Dest: 你应该感到愤怒。这里的刽子手废得连根萝卜都切不断。.

String.Source: Do you want hear the story, or do you plan on interrupting me some more?
String.Dest: 你是想听故事呢，还是想继续在这人招人烦呢？

String.Source: I'm skeptical there's any truth to this story whatsoever.
String.Dest: 我怀疑这个故事的真实性。

String.Source: Of course. Just need to take a breather. I'm not as spry as I used to be.
String.Dest: 当然。我只需要短暂地休息一下。我不如我以前那么灵敏了。

String.Source: On your way to High Hrothgar?
String.Dest: 你正要去高吼峰?

String.Source: Of course. Just need to take a breather. I'm not as spry as I used to be.
String.Dest: 当然。我只需要短暂地休息一下。我不如我以前那么灵敏了。

String.Source: On your way to High Hrothgar?
String.Dest: 你正要去高吼峰?

String.Source: Probably? As in they could just as easily dye my cloak green? This is not some peasant rag, this is a family heirloom!
String.Dest: 可能吗？难道他们可以轻而易举地把我的斗篷染成绿色吗？这可不是什么乞丐抹布，这是个传家宝！

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: I will not leave its fate to some toothless harridan who throws a few insects in a bowl and calls herself an alchemist.
String.Dest: 我才不会把它的命运留给那些把几只虫子扔进碗里，就大言不惭的把自己当炼金术师的无齿的老泼妇呢。

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! A noble like yourself would understand.
String.Dest: 这个披风在我的家族传承了七代，七代！像你这样的上等人应该明白这意味着什么。

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: Probably? As in they could just as easily dye my cloak green? This is not one of your beggar rags, peasant, this is a family heirloom!
String.Dest: 有可能？在他们看来可以很轻易地把我的斗篷染成绿色吗？这不是你的一块儿乞丐抹布，农民，这是个传家宝！

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: I will not leave its fate to some toothless harridan who throws a few insects in a bowl and calls herself an alchemist.
String.Dest: 我才不会把它的命运留给那些把几只虫子扔进碗里，就大言不惭的把自己当炼金术师的无齿的老泼妇呢。

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: Seven generations this cloak has been in my family. Seven! Can you count to seven, peasant? I'd venture not, but it's a long time.
String.Dest: 这件斗篷在我家族里传了七代！七代！能数到七么，你这乡巴佬？我打赌你不行，但七代真的是很长的一段时间。

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: One of my ancestors strangled a bear to death with his bare hands to get this fur, and it's been passed down from father to son ever since.
String.Dest: 这张毛皮是我一位祖先空手勒死一头熊时得到的，然后就一代代地传下来直到我这儿。

String.Source: What about Angeline's Aromatics? They can probably formulate a cleaning agent.
String.Dest: 那安吉琳的芳香呢？他们很可能制造一种清洁药剂。

String.Source: Nicely? They are lowborn guards. They are the help. I announced myself and then demanded they grant me an audience with their Jarl.
String.Dest: 和气地？他们只是卑微的守卫。他们只是打下手的。我向他们申明我是谁，要求他们让我谒见领主。

String.Source: Did you ask them nicely?
String.Dest: 你有好好的问他们吗？?

String.Source: But perhaps I have come to the wrong Jarl. It doesn't seem like this one has taught his guards the importance of respecting their betters.
String.Dest: 但也可能是我找错领主了。这个领主似乎没告诉他的守卫，诺德人有多看重尊严。

String.Source: Did you ask them nicely?
String.Dest: 你有好好的问他们吗？?

String.Source: In that case, I will find one who does.
String.Dest: 既然如此，我会找出做了这件事的人。

String.Source: Did you ask them nicely?
String.Dest: 你有好好的问他们吗？?

String.Source: I beg your pardon! You may be dressed like a noble, but your manners are akin to a brute!
String.Dest: 你再说一遍试试！你也许穿的像个贵族，但你的举止就像是一个畜生！

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: Why don't you trade those fine robes for a suit of armor, peasant, because you aren't fooling anyone!
String.Dest: 为什么你不拿这些漂亮的长袍去换一件盔甲呢，乡巴佬？因为谁都不会上你的当！

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: It's a shame what the Blue Palace has become, letting your ilk roam around here like bilge rats!
String.Dest: 蓝色宫殿变成这样真是令人感到耻辱，让人感觉自己像是鼠辈在到处乱窜。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: In fact, maybe I ought to pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually has standards.
String.Dest: 说实话，也许我应该去拜访一下风舵城的领主。我听说他确实挺有本事。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: Common insults from a lowborn commoner. I expect nothing less.
String.Dest: 常见的侮辱都来自出身低微的平民。哎，我也对他们不指望什么了。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: Perhaps lilke most brutes, you mistake my fine clothes and austere manner for weakness. I am a Nord. My ancestors were Nords.
String.Dest: 可能像大部分混账一样，你因为无知弄混了我的衣着和习俗。我是一个诺德人。我的祖先是诺德人。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: I have mastered the military arts just as I have mastered the art of grace. Peasants who understand neither have no place in the Blue Palace.
String.Dest: 我已经掌握了军事艺术，就像我已掌握了优雅的艺术。对此二者毫无建树的土包子在蓝宫这样的地方可没有立足之地。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: It's no wonder I can't get an audience with the High Queen, with all the commoners hoarding her time. Of course, it's her fault for letting them in.
String.Dest: 难怪我没有机会觐见至高女王，跟平民交涉就够她忙的了。当然，放他们进蓝宫是她自找的。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: In fact, maybe I ought to pay the Jarl of Windhelm a visit. I hear he actually has standards.
String.Dest: 说实话，也许我应该去拜访一下风舵城的领主。我听说他确实挺有本事。

String.Source: It must have been a very small bear.
String.Dest: 那肯定是只超小的熊。

String.Source: About time.
String.Dest: 是时候了。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: There's no place left for lordmanship!
String.Dest: 已经礼崩乐坏啦！

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: This is outrageous! Am I lord, or a bumpkin!
String.Dest: 真是令人惊叹不已！ 我不是领主就是一个土包子！

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 快点好吗？

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。
